plants.name: Sunflower
plants.description: The sunflower is a tall, annual plant with large, yellow flowers. It is native to North America and is a popular garden flower. Sunflowers are a good source of pollen and nectar for bees and other pollinators.

plants.description: Aromatic shrub with narrow leaves and spikes of purple flowers.

plants.name: Geranium

plants.description: Roses are classic flowering plants known for their beautiful blooms and pleasant fragrance.

plants.description: New England Aster is a perennial flower with large, showy purple flowers.

plants.name: Butterfly Bush
plants.description: Butterfly Bush is a deciduous shrub with long, cone-shaped clusters of fragrant flowers.

plants.description: Calendula is an annual or perennial flower with bright yellow or orange ray-like petals.
